name: Answer Knot
description:
"Hey Zach, as you're probably fooling around on Steam instead of finishing your paper for UNICEF, I suggest you check out this game about us. It's super-short, but hey I looked it up a little and, it's a first from a tiny tiny Swiss studio that was used to make movies. That's why it looks that much like a movie. I'm positive you're gonna love the music pieces, too.

Anyway, make up the goddarn couch when you're done napping, man !"

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Things that this game is not
  • An interactive movie
  • A horror game
  • Super-expensive
  • Going to take all your time away
  • Difficult beyond limits
  • A walking simulator (okay.... maybe a little)




We live here
